showScoreExcerpt:
“The pop score, with book by Jessie Nelson, doesn’t send you out humming anything in particular but does give a big shout-out to the empowerment of women...The girls are many times caught in the cliché of pushing the comedy buttons...Jessie Mueller gives a star performance, not a surprise...Hers is the most developed of all the characters, her nuanced performance rising significantly with Diane Paulus’ direction.”
